text:
Hey guys, it’s Ro, welcome to another Nerdy
Nummies!

Today I’m gonna be making Adventure Time
Cupcakes! I got so many requests for

these, so many, like, so, so, so, so, so,
so, so, so, so, so, so, so, so many
requests for these!

And I love the cartoon on Cartoon Network,
good job!

So, today we’re gonna make those adventure
time cupcakes!

I decided to make Funfetti cupcakes, this
is Funfetti box mix, this is

1 of my favorites, other than rainbow cake!
Doo-doo-doo!

So I pre-made cupcakes to save some time,
because we’re just gonna focus
on decorating today. Da-da!

The colors that you will need today will be
white frosting, tan frosting for

their skin color, for like princess bubblegum.
Blue frosting, teal frosting
for Beemo! And orange!

I am going to dip all of my cupcakes. You
take 1 like this, you microwave it

for about 10 seconds, and then, dip! Just
straight down, straight up.

Sometimes accidents happen, but that’s OK,
let’s see if we did it!

Oh yeah! And it just makes your cupcake look
really, really smooth, and
that’s what you want!
Look at the Ice King, it looks like his nose!
I don’t even have to make 1! Perfect!

And you’re gonna do this with all of your
cupcakes.

Now for Finn, we’re gonna be doing something
a little bit different, you’re

gonna take your cupcake, and take 2 little
marshmallows, and 2 toothpicks.

And you’re gonna stick him on the ear, just
a little bit, and stick him into
the cupcake.
And now, Finn is ready to dip. Merp!

Then for Lumpy Space Princess we’re gonna
do something a little bit different,

you’re gonna take purple frosting, I left
it in the can, and we’re just gonna

spray it on top of the cupcake, because she’s
lumpy, she’s got a lot of

lady lumps, so, we’re just gonna spread
it out by hand.
This looks like brains.

Now that we have all the cupcakes dipped,
we’re gonna start decorating them.

Starting with my favorite! Lumpy Space Princess!
Oh my glob!

I found the cutest sparkles, they’re little
star sparkles, sprinkles?

You’re just gonna take the little star sprinkle,
and put it right at the top.

Oh my glob, it’s so cute! Now I’m gonna
be making her face with black frosting.

And it’s just in this plastic bag with the teeniest
black tip that I could find.

Because their eyes and facial features are
so small.

Now we are gonna make Jake the doggie! Um,
I got Smartees, the candy,

at the store, and we’re gonna be using the
white Smartees for his eyes.

And then for the rest oh him, we’re just
gonna use more orange frosting
and black frosting for details.

Now we are going to make Beemo! With this
teal cupcake.

And all you’re gonna need, blue Airhead
for the screen, yellow Starburst.

I found these little, they’re kind of like
Runts but they’re circles

and I’m gonna use a red circle for her big
button.
And I have green and blue for the little buttons.
Now we’re going to make Ice King!

All you’re gonna need for the Ice King,
is I got 2 yellow Starbursts for his

crown, there are 3 of these little red candies,
I found them at Michael’s

they were, um, in the candy section, I don’t
know…

Just anything round and little, I think you
can use anything.
And white Airheads.

Now we’re gonna be making Bubblegum Princess!
The things you will need:

I got 2 Airheads, these are flavor strawberry
banana, and it’s just a

really light pink color and it just reminds
me of the color of her hair,
and I thought that that was the best 1.

And then, blue candy pearls. These are the kind of
fancy, edible pearls that

people usually put on wedding cakes. But I’m
gonna use that for the little

gem on her crown, and then, a yellow Starburst
for her crown.
We’re gonna roll this out.

Oh my glob! I finished them, they’re so
cute, and I had so much fun doing these

that I was like, I have to do more! So I’m
doing Rainicorn and the logo,
I decided to add 2 extra little pieces.
So, ta-da! Let’s start with the Unicorn.

I got 6 cupcakes, I frosted them blue so they
look like clouds, and,

I was at The Sweet Factory and I love this,
it’s rainbow candy rope.
And we’re gonna wrap it all the way around.
To make our Rainicorn!

With the extra batter, I had so much Funfetti
batter, I made this little cake.

And it’s just, a 1, 1 level cake, And then I
put fondant all the way around it,

and then I took buttercream frosting and made
like a cloud shape, for the logo.

For the Adventure Time letters, the only time
I used fondant is I cut these

letters out of the fondant and tried to make
them look as much like the font

that they use on the show. And I even made,
out of fondant, the little sword.

And for these 2 gems I used little pieces
of candy.
Let’s put it all together!
Boom! Adventure Time Cupcakes!

They’re so cute! My favorite is still Lumpy
Space Princess, she’s so cute,
oh my glob, she’s so cute!

Thanks you guys for watching I finally did
this! The most requested

Nerdy Nummies that I’ve ever had, so I hope
that you guys liked it.

And if you have any other suggestions for
any other Nerdy Nummies, please,

leave me a comment and let me know and I will
do my best to make it happen!
OK, thanks so much, bye-bye!
